original_text: We have done nothing to stop you from being our friends. But you have not really wanted to become our friends.
korean_text: 너희가 우리 안에서 좁아진 것이 아니라 오직 너희 심정에서 좁아진 것이니라

sentences.original_text: to stop you from being our friends
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 우리의 친구가 되는 것을 막기 위해

sentences.original_text: But you have not really wanted
